Text:
i can' t believe it - my all time favourite team - Boston Celtics - Oh my god, i miss watching Larry Bird and Co - Basket-Ball was played by men in those days, not kids like today lol... Nepotu you are one in a million... no, THE ONE!!
You have no idea how happy i am - i used to buy NBA on VHS from the US in the eighties... thank you so much mister!!!!
I'm very happy for you! I didn't realise that you are such a Boston's fan. Enjoy it, my friend! The video quality is not that good but watchable.
Blocked @ 14.4%... Will try later on.... Take care Mate!

and by the way, yes I love Boston but I love basket-ball more... Used to play it on county level back in the days in France... also big fan of The Bulls (Jordan and co) amongst others... Hourray for Nepotu!!
It is interesting to see young Isiah and Bill Laimbeer against world champions - Celtics. This rivalry would continue through 80's with great tension! Thanks Nepotu!!
It is interesting to see young Isiah and Laimbeer against mighty Celtics (current NBA champions at that time). This rivalry would continiue through 80's with great tension! Thank you Nepotu!!
You're welcome both, jmbsc & ivo1978! I like your interesting comments.
Thank you Nepotu! I will seed this one.
